name: Danilolyra
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.

####__1. Encontre o domínio das funções:__

a)  \ $f(x) = 2x+1$\

 Resp: __$D = x \in \mathbb{R}$__


b)  \ $f(x) = \frac{x+3}{x+1}$\


 Resp: \ $x+1 \ne 0$\
\ $x \ne -1$\
__$D = \mathbb{R} - \{-1\}$__

c)  \ $f(x) = \sqrt{9 - x^2}$\

 Resp: $9 - x^2 \ge 0$   
$-x^2 \ge -9$  
$x^2 \le 9$  
$x \le \sqrt{9}$  
$x \le \pm3$  
__$D = -3 \le x \le 3$__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
